Name: Sand Bullets
About the game: Sand Bullets is our brand new effort to bring something new to the market. We are connecting a Top-Down Shooter with Telephony as a Service, and we will deliver a game that will interact with you through your phone. Get ready to jump into something new, and help our team to shape something new! In this first version, there will be ONE STAGE and NO TELEPHONY SYSTEM. The Early Access will allow you to help developers shape two fronts: (1) Testing core mechanics like the GRAB and Throw system, different types of guns, and stage improvements; and (2) connecting all that with telephony. We will have a Game Designer focused on Telephony interaction, and you'll be able to give us feedback on how it could be successfully implemented. We will also have a gameplay designer that will improve and change core mechanics. We plan to deliver 16 stages, a comic book, and Telephony as a service, and putting it all together in the right way is the reason the game is on Early Access.
